attributes.additional_details: Free school meals for low income families or universal credit families with children ! A higher budget for school cooks to be able to provide a healthy meal choice for these children
attributes.background: I want the law to allow low income zero income families to be able to benefit from the system allowing free school meals

rejection.details:
Children of families who receive certain means tested benefits are already entitled to free school meals. You can find out more about who is eligible for free school meals here: https://www.gov.uk/apply-free-school-meals

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Review and increase the income thresholds for Free School Meals: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/614134

Fund an increase to the school meal allowance in line with inflation: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/605502

Increase funding for school meals so schools can invest in healthier foods: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/610990
